# selectionLimit

**Instance Property**

The maximum number of selections the user can make.

## Declaration

```swift
var selectionLimit: Int?
```

## Discussion

This property updates the photos picker configuration ([doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/PhotosUI/PHPickerConfiguration-swift.struct]) property [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/PhotosUI/PHPickerConfiguration-swift.struct/selectionLimit].
title: selectionLimit
